Assessment.QuestionText: Can you arrange the steps for creating a report using the Crystal Report Creation Wizard in the correct order?

Options.Option: From the Available data sources section, select a data source.
From the Available Styles section, select a report type and style.
Select the Crystal Report option from the Add New Item dialog box and click the Add Button.
From the Crystal Reports Gallery, select the report document and report expert.
Enter the name of the report file in the Name textbox.

Steps.Step: From the Available data sources section, select a data source.
From the Available Styles section, select a report type and style.
Select the Crystal Report option from the Add New Item dialog box and click the Add Button.
From the Crystal Reports Gallery, select the report document and report expert.
Enter the name of the report file in the Name textbox.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct sequence is displayed on the right.
